<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get a list of all metrics accounts</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v1/account-management/metrics-accounts"}></MethodEndpoint>



Please ensure to change the region in the URL to match your account's region.

## Request

<div><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

OK

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem","paddingBottom":".5rem"}}>Array [</div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"ID of the metrics account"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"accountName"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Name of metrics account."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"token"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Metrics account token"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"createdAt"} required={false} schemaName={"date-time"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp of account creation"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"planUts"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"Usage plan for Unique Time Series (UTS). UTS defines the number of unique time series an account is allowed to have. If usage exceeds the plan, exceeding data points will not be processed."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"authorizedAccountsIds"} required={false} schemaName={"integer[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","description":"IDs of authorized accounts","items":{"type":"integer"}}}></SchemaItem><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem"}}>]</div></li></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"[\n  {\n    \"id\": 0,\n    \"accountName\": \"string\",\n    \"token\": \"string\",\n    \"createdAt\": \"2024-05-28T20:27:29.268Z\",\n    \"planUts\": 0,\n    \"authorizedAccountsIds\": [\n      0\n    ]\n  }\n]"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
